snippet: After having been expelled from a retreat in Arizona, Ian Thorson was found dead in a cave nearby, and his wife, Christie McNally, was found thirsty and delirious.
abstract: Discovery of the dead body of Ian Thorson in April in a desert cave in Arizona after having been expelled from Diamond Mountain University, a nearby Buddhist retreat, has raised questions about the intensely private community and some of the unorthodox practices encouraged by Michael Roach, the monk who runs the retreat.
lead_paragraph: After having been expelled from a retreat in Arizona, Ian Thorson was found dead in a cave nearby, and his wife, Christie McNally, was found thirsty and delirious.
